<Link id="l01571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1571"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int64&#95;t NullPtr =</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1587"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1588"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;isBaseWithConstantOffset(Addr)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (add n0, c1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1590"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1591"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> N0 = Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#a977e54da724d62e7b08e2ad69723731e">getOperand</a>(0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1592"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t C1 = Addr.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue/#ac969b6c833cfa44c1b4fcd5790268340">getConstantOperandVal</a>(1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1593"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Offsets in vaddr must be positive if range checking is enabled.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1595"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The total computation of vaddr + soffset + offset must not overflow.  If</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vaddr is negative, even if offset is 0 the sgpr offset add will end up</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1598"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// overflowing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1599"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1600"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Prior to gfx9, MUBUF instructions with the vaddr offset enabled would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1601"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// always perform a range check. If a negative vaddr base index was used,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this would fail the range check. The overall address computation would</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// compute a valid address, but this doesn&#39;t happen due to the range</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1604"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// check. For out-of-bounds MUBUF loads, a 0 is returned.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1606"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Therefore it should be safe to fold any VGPR offset on gfx9 into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MUBUF vaddr, but not on older subtargets which can only do this if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1608"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sign bit is known 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1609"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SIInstrInfo &#42;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a530363b25d555de667bf4f23bc6349a6">TII</a> = Subtarget-&gt;getInstrInfo();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1610"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a530363b25d555de667bf4f23bc6349a6">TII</a>-&gt;isLegalMUBUFImmOffset(C1) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1611"><span class="doxyHighlight">        (!Subtarget-&gt;privateMemoryResourceIsRangeChecked() ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1612"><span class="doxyHighlight">         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;SignBitIsZero(N0))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1613"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::tie(VAddr, SOffset) = foldFrameIndex(N0);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1614"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ImmOffset = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getTargetConstant(C1, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1615"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1616"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1617"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1618"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1619"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (node)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1620"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::tie(VAddr, SOffset) = foldFrameIndex(Addr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ImmOffset = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getTargetConstant(0, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, MVT::i32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1622"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1623"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1754"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// add the rest.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1755"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1756"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a FLAT instruction the hardware decides whether to access</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1757"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// global/scratch/shared memory based on the high bits of vaddr,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1888"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getTargetConstant(SplitImmOffset, SDLoc(), MVT::i32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1889"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1890"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1891"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1892"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1893"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We are adding a 64 bit SGPR and a constant. If constant bus limit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1894"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is 1 we would need to perform 1 or 2 extra moves for each half of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1895"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the constant and it is better to do a scalar add and then issue a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1896"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// single VALU instruction to materialize zero. Otherwise it is less</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1897"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions to perform VALU adds with immediates or inline literals.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1898"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLiterals =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1899"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a530363b25d555de667bf4f23bc6349a6">TII</a>-&gt;isInlineConstant(APInt(32, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a901112c493d3827cda924430a6fbc9f4">Lo&#95;32</a>(COffsetVal))) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1900"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a530363b25d555de667bf4f23bc6349a6">TII</a>-&gt;isInlineConstant(APInt(32, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7b622c469acc130c9a500b85b1473ef3">Hi&#95;32</a>(COffsetVal)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1901"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Subtarget-&gt;getConstantBusLimit(AMDGPU::V&#95;ADD&#95;U32&#95;e64) &gt; NumLiterals)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1902"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1903"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2772"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2773"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This requires 2 instructions. It is possible to write a pattern to support</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2774"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this, but the generated isel emitter doesn&#39;t correctly deal with multiple</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2777"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2778"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Match source modifiers.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2781"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (int&#95;amdgcn&#95;interp&#95;p1&#95;f16</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2785"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   (V&#95;INTERP&#95;P1LV&#95;F16 $src0&#95;modifiers, VGPR&#95;32:$src0, timm:$attr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2786"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       timm:$attrchan, 0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l02787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2787"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       (V&#95;INTERP&#95;MOV&#95;F32 2, timm:$attr, timm:$attrchan), timm:$high)&gt; &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2792"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64isellowering-cpp/#a51cb24bd3e700fcf2f93d1afbb555a16">SDValue</a> ToM0 = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getCopyToReg(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/selectiondagisel/#a2b37615f95f3e2fdd5564188c0965132">CurDAG</a>-&gt;getEntryNode(), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, AMDGPU::M0,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l02986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2986"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fold fsub &#91;+-&#93;0 into fneg. This may not have folded depending on the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getOperandBits = &#91;&amp;Src, In&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, uint8&#95;t &amp;Bits) -&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3795"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3796"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3797"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AMDGPUDAGToDAGISel::SelectBITOP3(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> In, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Src0, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Src1,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3798"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Src2, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sdvalue">SDValue</a> &amp;Tbl)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3799"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;SDValue, 3&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3800"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t TTbl;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3801"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumOpcodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3802"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3803"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::tie(NumOpcodes, TTbl) = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpuinstructionselector-cpp/#a489612a97ef3b9b60986e6db794a5f97">BitOp3&#95;Op</a>(In, Src);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3804"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3805"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Src.empty() case can happen if all operands are all zero or all ones.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3806"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Normally it shall be optimized out before reaching this.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3807"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumOpcodes &lt; 2 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-linkmodules-cpp-/#ab56eb2027bc9c069aa696e54de8b4298a276e79316561733d64abdf00f8e8ae48">Src</a>.empty())</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l03809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3809"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3810"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For a uniform case threshold should be higher to account for moves between</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3811"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// VGPRs and SGPRs. It needs one operand in a VGPR, rest two can be in SGPRs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3812"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and a readtfirstlane after.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3813"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumOpcodes &lt; 4 &amp;&amp; !In-&gt;isDivergent())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3814"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l03815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3815"></CodeLine>
